"I have an idea for an app, now what?"
Mobile apps are more popular today than ever before.
With 5 million total apps currently available for download on Google’s Play Store and Apple’s App Store, apps are skyrocketing in number and this trend shows no signs of slowing.
With so many entrepreneurs trying to develop the next truly “disruptive” app, it’s likely that you too have an idea for a potentially groundbreaking app.
But how can you turn your idea into reality by moving from concept to execution?
And how do you manage to build a business around your app in the most cluttered marketplace in history?
In this article, I’ll discuss some of the most fundamental strategies.
I'm adding the link to the article in the first comment below.

I've started a new company: Solid Cloud, LLC.  We are "Cloud experts" We help companies start integrating the cloud with their business.  We also develop and host custom cloud based software solutions for customers to take advantage of the cloud's economies of scale.  Our customers save money and have better integrated systems which help them be more competitive.  How can we help your business move to the cloud ?
I help people solve problems with technology.  I am a very effective Project Manager that can help design, manage and implement your technology solutions.
I help companies and businesses develop cloud-telephony based solutions.
